00037 #include "egs_gaussian_shape.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 extern "C" {
00042 
00043 EGS_GAUSSIAN_SHAPE_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape* createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00044         EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00045     if( !input ) {
00046         egsWarning("createShape(circle): null input?\n"); return 0;
00047     }
00048     vector<EGS_Float> sigma;
00049     int err = input->getInput("sigma",sigma);
00050     if( err ) {
00051         egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no 'sigma' input\n"); return 0;
00052     }
00053     EGS_Input *ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape",false);
00054     EGS_BaseShape *shape = 0;
00055     if( ishape ) {
00056         shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape); delete ishape;
00057     }
00058     if( !shape ) {
00059         string shape_name; int err = input->getInput("shape name",shape_name);
00060         if( err ) {
00061             egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no inline shape definition"
00062                   " and no 'shape name' keyword\n"); return 0;
00063         }
00064         shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(shape_name);
00065         if( !shape ) {
00066             egsWarning("createShape(gaussian shape): no shape named %s "
00067                     "exists\n",shape_name.c_str());
00068             return 0;
00069         }
00070     }
00071     EGS_GaussianShape *s;
00072     if( sigma.size() == 1 )
00073         s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],0,0,"",f);
00074     else if( sigma.size() == 2 )
00075         s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],sigma[1],0,"",f);
00076     else
00077         s = new EGS_GaussianShape(shape,sigma[0],sigma[1],sigma[2],"",f);
00078     s->setName(input); s->setTransformation(input);
00079     return s;
00080 }
00081 
00082 }
